Posts.Content: Sep 1, 2011 07:21AM pharmalady1 wrote: I am finishing my second week of radiation treatment.  So far so good although it is still early in the treatment.  I apply pure aloe gel on the entire breast twice a day.  I also apply powder under the breast in the morning before my treatment.  I am hoping not to have any nasty side effects.  I wish you well on your journey to health.
Posts.Title: I don't want to go to my planning rads tomorrow bedo Lissa123
